name: A Killing In White (W.I.P) 1.28.19 Build (Fixed Dialogue & Win State)
name_original: A Killing In White (W.I.P) 1.28.19 Build (Fixed Dialogue & Win State)
description:
where it stands - the gameplay loop is complete and what bugs existed with the win state and dialogue system from December should now be fixed.

Controls: W,A,S,D to move, E to interact, Space to progress dialogue, Left Mouse Button to pick up & place puzzle pieces.

more information about the project on the whole will be made available as development progresses
